appendix.title: Math
appendix.para: FloatMath.acosx Returns the arc cosine of angle x, which is given in radians.
FloatMath.acoshx Returns the inverse hyperbolic cosine of angle x, which is given in radians.
FloatMath.asinx Returns the arc sine of angle x, which is given in radians.
FloatMath.asinhx Returns the inverse hyperbolic sine of angle x, which is given in radians.
FloatMath.atanx Returns the arc tangent of angle x, which is given in radians.
FloatMath.atanhx Returns the inverse hyperbolic tangent of angle x, which is given in radians.
FloatMath.atan2yx Returns the principal value of the arc tangent of y/x.
FloatMath.cbrtn Returns the cube root of the given Numeric.
FloatMath.cosx Returns the cosine of angle x, which is given in radians.
FloatMath.erfx Returns the error function of x.
FloatMath.erfcx Returns the complementary error function of x.
FloatMath.expx Returns Math::E ** x.
ArrayMath.frexpn Returns an Array whose first element is a Float which, when multiplied by 2 raised to the power of the last element, equals n.
FloatMath.gammax Returns the result of the Gamma function for x.
FloatMath.hypotxy Returns the hypotenuse of the right-angled triangle with sides x and y.
FloatMath.ldexpbaseexponent Returns the product of the Float base and 2 raised to the Integer exponent.

ArrayMath.lgammax Returns a two-element Array whose first element is the natural logarithm of the absolute value of the Gamma function for x, and last element is -1 if the Gamma function returned a negative number, or 1, otherwise.
FloatMath.lognbase=Math::E Returns the natural logarithm of the Numeric n in the base base.
FloatMath.log10n Returns the base-10 logarithm of the given Numeric.
FloatMath.log2n Returns the base-2 logarithm of the given Numeric.
FloatMath.sinx Returns the sine of angle x, which is given in radians.
FloatMath.sinhx Returns the hyperbolic sine of angle x, which is given in radians.
FloatMath.sqrtx Returns the non-negative square root of x, raising Math::DomainError if x is negative.
FloatMath.tanx Returns the tangent of angle x, which is given in radians.
FloatMath.tanhx Returns the hyperbolic tangent of angle x, which is given in radians.
